description.short: Chevy offers you capable, efficient and durable trucks backed by 100 years of proven performance.
description.long: Chevrolet offers you capable, efficient, durable, and professional vehicles backed by a 100 years of proven performance and an abundant supply of high-performance parts from companies like BDS Suspensions, Cognito, RPG Offroad and Baja Kits.
description.push: THOR can help you build a serious off-road Chevrolet with the on-road comfort and towing capability that make these vehicles a dream to drive.

seo.title: Texas Chevy Truck SUV Installer
seo.description: At THOR Off-Road we know how to take your Chevrolet Colorado, Silverado or Tahoe to the next level.
